name: Hurtworld
description: Hurtworld is a hardcore multiplayer survival FPS with a focus on competitive gunplay and strategic map control. Built for hardcore gamers, Hurtworld aims to punish.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 64 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 660/Radeon HD 6970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
